Settings.Name: gameinstructor_enable
Settings.Description: Enables or disables the instructions and tips that pop up while in-game.

Settings.Name: fps_max
Settings.Description: Sets the maximum frames per second that will be rendered by your client. Set to 0 to disable the FPS cap.

Settings.Name: net_graph
Settings.Description: Enables or disables the net graph display, which shows ping, FPS, and other client variables.

Settings.Name: net_graphproportionalfont
Settings.Description: Sets whether or not net graph font should be made proportional to the game resolution.

Settings.Name: cl_autowepswitch
Settings.Description: Sets whether or not weapons are automatically equipped when picked up.

Settings.Name: volume
Settings.Description: Sets the master volume of the game.

Settings.Name: snd_menumusic_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of music when in the main menu.

Settings.Name: snd_roundstart_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of music played at the start of every round.

Settings.Name: snd_roundend_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of music played at the end of every round.

Settings.Name: snd_mapobjective_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of music played when there is ten seconds left on the bomb timer.

Settings.Name: snd_tensecondwarning_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of music played when there is ten seconds left on the bomb timer.

Settings.Name: snd_deathcamera_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of sound effect played at the start of the death screen.

Settings.Name: snd_mvp_volume
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of MVP audio.

Settings.Name: voice_enable
Settings.Description: Sets whether in-game voice communication is on or off

Settings.Name: voice_scale
Settings.Description: Sets the volume of voice communication (VOIP).

Settings.Name: sensitivity
Settings.Description: Sets the mouse sensitivity.

Settings.Name: zoom_sensitivity_ratio_mouse
Settings.Description: Sets the mouse sensitivity when aiming down a scope, using a ratio value.

Settings.Name: m_rawinput
Settings.Description: Sets whether the game uses raw input from the mouse to control aim.

Settings.Name: cl_hud_radar_scale
Settings.Description: Sets the size of the radar.

Settings.Name: cl_radar_always_centered
Settings.Description: Sets whether the radar is centered on the player or not.

Settings.Name: cl_radar_scale
Settings.Description: Sets the scale of the map in the radar.

Settings.Name: cl_radar_rotate
Settings.Description: Sets whether the radar rotates with the player.

Settings.Name: cl_radar_icon_scale_min
Settings.Description: Sets the scale of the icons in the radar.

Settings.Name: cl_radar_square_with_scoreboard
Settings.Description: Sets whether the radar becomes square when the scoreboard is on screen.
